snippet.title: 90s Inspired Point And Click Adventure Game | The Dark Prophecy
snippet.description:
The Dark Prophecy is a 2D pixel-art Point and Click adventure inspired by the best retro games of the 90s. Welcome to a peaceful medieval village, where life is safe and calm. But one fateful night, everything changes.

Epic➡️https://bit.ly/The_Dark_Prophecy_On_Epic
GOG➡️https://bit.ly/The_Dark_Prophecy_On_GOG
Steam➡️https://bit.ly/The_Dark_Prophecy_On_Steam

Welcome to a peaceful medieval village, where life is safe and calm. But one fateful night, everything changes.

Play as Jacob, an average medieval boy, on his quest to save the kingdom from a dark prophecy.

Jacob finds himself amid a whirlpool of magical events. Now the fate of his village (and whole kingdom) depends on him.

- Help Jacob on his quest and save the kingdom from the dark prophecy,
- Explore the environment and find solutions to move the plot forward,
- Discover new items and fantastical locations,
- Enjoy beautiful pixel-art locations.

Featuring:
- Choose your own adventure dialogues,
- "Look at/Use/Talk to" interactions,
- A dark prophecy and witchcraft.

➡️https://www.tiktok.com/@meridian4.games 
➡️https://www.instagram.com/meridian_4/
➡️https://www.facebook.com/Meridian4
➡️https://twitter.com/meridian4

#pointandclick #adventuregame #indiegame
